qas.question: How many reported murders were there in 2008?
How many murders were there in 2014?
How many murders were there in Boston in 2015?

context: In 2008, there were <a0_0>62<a0_0/> reported homicides. Through December 20 each of 2014 and 2015, the Boston Police Department reported <a1_0>52<a1_0/> and <a2_0>39<a2_0/> homicides, respectively.
